articles.title: Covid-19 deaths (Oct 20): 69 reported fatalities, death toll crosses 28,000 - Malaysiakini
articles.description: Malaysia is highest in Asia in the number of Covid deaths per capita.
articles.content:
COVID-19 | The Health Ministry's Github data repository reported a total of 69 Covid-19 fatalities yesterday (Oct 19), bringing the cumulative death toll to 28,062.
Malaysia is the worst-performing … [+234 chars]

articles.author: Joan E. Solsman
articles.title: Netflix rides Squid Game's phenom to global subscriber growth again in 3Q - CNET
articles.description: Netflix added more members than analysts estimated it would, especially in Asia, after post-lockdown sluggishness had marred its year up till now.
articles.content:
Angela Lang/CNET
Netflix added 4.28 million subscribers in the most recent quarter, riding an unexpected wave of global interest thanks to its breakout hitSquid Game that helped turned the company's… [+4535 chars]

articles.title: Malaysia's retirement scheme third in Asia - The Star Online
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR: Malaysias retirement system has been ranked third in Asia and 23rd globally despite a slight decrease in the countrys overall index value from 60.1 in 2020 to 59.6 in 2021, the 13th ann… [+3337 chars]

articles.author: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited
articles.title: Malaysia's AirAsia X proposes paying just 0.5% of $8bn debt - Bangkok Post
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) is proposing to pay just 0.5% of debt owed to each of its creditors and to terminate all existing contracts so that it can restructure 33.65 billion ringgit (US$8.1 billion) of liabilities, a document seen by Reuters shows.

articles.title: This Bugis confectionery store will teach you how to make Squid Game-themed ang ku kueh - AsiaOne
articles.description:
It has been around a month since South Korean drama Squid Game was first released on Netflix and the hype is still going strong. 

In hopes of riding on the trend, business from cafes to seafood restaurants have come up with their own renditions of Squid Ga…
